敄字的基本解释

敄
wù
强。

敄
móu
古同“劺”，勉力。

敄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》亡遇切，去遇，微。］
强勉。后作“務”。
[②]［móu］
［《集韻》迷浮切，平矦，明。］
同“劺1”。
黾勉。

敄字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敄； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页469第24
【廣韻】亡遇切【集韻】曰遇切，?音務。彊也。　又【廣韻】文甫切【集韻】罔甫切，?音武。義同。　又【集韻】迷浮切，音謀。與劺同。北燕之外，相勉努力謂之劺。【說文】从攴作敄。敄字原从攴作。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" death meets cutting, going to meet, micro. ]
Reluctantly. Later as "service".
[②]［móu］
["Ji Yun" fan floating cut, flat 矦, Ming. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　敄; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 469-24
[Guang Yun] Death meets cut [Ji Yun] Says meets cut,? Audio. Strong also.　[Guangyun] Wenfuqie [Jiyun] Yongfuqie,? Yinwu. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Miscellaneous, Floating, Yinmou. Same as 劺. Outside of Beiyan, Xiang Mian worked hard to call it 劺. [Speaking text] From stunned. The word 敄 was originally made from 攴.
